name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: AI & Data Lead Engineer
professional_summary: Leading the development and deployment of AI and data-driven solutions for insurance, healthcare, and banking clients.
Collaborating cross-functionally with senior stakeholders to design and implement cutting-edge data science projects.
Developing and operationalizing complex predictive models utilizing machine learning and deep learning techniques.
Designing scalable data architecture and ensuring seamless data integration with various systems.
Implementing robust data quality and governance processes to ensure integrity and accountability.
Providing strategic direction and technical expertise to data science teams and stakeholders.
Developing and delivering high-quality data products and reports to meet business needs.
Collaborating with business teams to understand business goals and identify opportunities for data-driven insights.
Designing and implementing data visualization dashboards to provide actionable insights.
Developing and maintaining data governance frameworks and best practices.
Identifying and mitigating technical risks and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
Collaborating with cloud teams to design and implement secure and compliant cloud infrastructure.
Designing and implementing data archiving and purge processes to ensure data retention and compliance.
Developing and maintaining data backup and recovery procedures.
Collaborating with security teams to ensure the security and integrity of data.
Developing and implementing data security compliance frameworks and controls.
